description: Input configuration for ClientScout AI to discover business leads by sector and location.

sector.title: Sector
sector.description: Select the industry sector for which business leads should be generated.

country.title: Country (Optional)
country.description: Enter the country name to limit the search (e.g., India, Australia, USA). Leave empty for broader search.

state.title: State / Province (Optional)
state.description: Enter the state or province name for more precise targeting.

city.title: City / Suburb (Optional)
city.description: Enter the city or suburb name where businesses should be discovered.

postcode.title: Postcode / ZIP Code (Optional)
postcode.description: Enter a postcode or ZIP code for highly precise location-based discovery.

keyword.title: Keyword (Optional)
keyword.description: Refine searches within the selected sector (e.g., Dermatologist, AI Startup, Builder).

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of business leads to collect. Lower values reduce cost.
